title: Banner, "Santa Claus", late 19th century
markings: On the sled that the centerl figure carries, "Oriental Printworks".
dimensions:
60.5 x 44.5 cm (23 13/16 x 17 1/2 in. )
The height is the weft. Selvages top and bottom.
description: Figure of Santa Claus in the center with four inset pictures; upper left; 'Santa Claus is coming' with figure in a sled; upper right, 'With compliments of Santa Claus' with figure of Santa putting a box down a chimney; lower left, 'All the stockings in the house, Were hung to be filled by Santa Claus' with children hanging stocking on a mantle; lower right, ''Santa Claus gave all these toys Because we were good girls and boys' with children playing with toys.

tombstone.epitaph: Banner, "Santa Claus", late 19th century.Roller-printed on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-273.
